projects.title: AI-Powered Data Pipeline
projects.description: Built a scalable ETL pipeline using Apache Spark and machine learning for real-time data processing. Reduced processing time by 60% and improved data quality.

projects.title: Real-Time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a real-time analytics dashboard using React and WebSocket connections. Provides instant insights into business metrics with interactive visualizations.

projects.title: Machine Learning Model API
projects.description: Created a RESTful API for serving machine learning models with automatic scaling and monitoring. Handles 10,000+ requests per minute with 99.9% uptime.

projects.title: Cloud-Native Microservices
projects.description: Architected and implemented a microservices platform using Kubernetes and Docker. Improved deployment frequency by 300% and reduced infrastructure costs.

projects.title: Data Visualization Platform
projects.description: Built an interactive data visualization platform for exploring large datasets. Features advanced filtering, real-time updates, and export capabilities.

projects.title: Automated Testing Framework
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive testing framework for data pipelines and ML models. Increased test coverage to 95% and reduced bug reports by 70%.
